titles: The lawyer outlaw'd, or, A brief answer to Mr. Hunts defence of the charter with some useful remarks on the Commons proceedings in the last Parliament at Westminster, in a letter to a friend.
author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
publisher: Printed by N.T. for the author,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Hunt, Thomas, 1627?-1688. --  Defence of the charter, and municipal rights of the city of London.
